author: mrglavas
msg: Improving the performance of toXMLFormat(). If the year < 10^9 avoid calling getEonAndYear(). This
prevents a new BigInteger from being created. This change also fixes a bug in the serialization of
negative years > -1000 which was causing leading zeros to be written in front of the '-' sign.

author: brianf
msg: MECLIPSE-295: jar has incorrect version in META-INF/maven/plugin.xml
